pages.text: The Exiled Sensei, this fugly guy with a big nose is the second of the new Sensei-mobs added to the game! $(br)Quite a bit stronger than the Undead Sensei and one again, has another unique fighting style! $(br2)--Any additional info can be found on the following pages--
This guy spawns in the overworld, but is quite rare to find(I think a bit rarer than a which or enderman maybe), and It can only spawn on solid blocks.
pages.title: Spawn Location

pages.text: The Exiled Sensei is quite strong, not only does he have a new move-set, but he can also inflict Weakness I when attacking and Slowness I when attacked! $(br2)Bonuses/abilities:$(br)--weakness Inflict--$(br)--Slowness Thorns--
pages.title: Attributes/Combat

pages.text: The Exiled Sensei can also be tamed!$(br)In order to do this, first you'll lower him to under 20 health, only then will he have a chance to be tamed.$(br)You'll now if he is tamable via if he is glowing or not. Once he is, give him 5 Emeralds and a Power Form 2.$(br) Then you'll have a best friend ;)
pages.title: Taming
